outtro.p: After domination the payoff matrix should look like: {{domination}} with row strategies {{r1strat}}, {{r2strat}} and {{r3strat}} remaining, and column strategies {{c1strat}}, {{c2strat}} and {{c3strat}} remaining.

Since {{optimalsolution}} is a saddle point corresponding to row strategy {{ropt}} and column strategy {{copt}}, these are the optimal strategies for both players. The vonNuemann value of the game is {{optimalsolution}}, so the game {{conclusion}}.
